Body:
y, Uy = MC(x, sigma_noise, b1, [1.0], Ub, runs=runs, blow=b2)
assert len(y) == len(x)
assert Uy.shape == (x.size, x.size)
if visualizeOutput:
    plt.plot(time, x)
    plt.plot(time, y)
    plt.plot(time, y - np.sqrt(np.diag(Uy)), linestyle='--', linewidth=1,
        color='red')
    plt.plot(time, y + np.sqrt(np.diag(Uy)), linestyle='--', linewidth=1,
        color='red')
    plt.show()
